name: BulkRetrieveCustomers
description:
Retrieve multiple customer profiles using IDs.

Use this tool to fetch detailed customer profiles by providing a list of customer IDs. It is useful for applications needing to access multiple customer data at once.

parameters.name: customer_ids
parameters.description: List of customer profile IDs to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The IDs of the [customer profiles](entity:Customer) to retrieve.
